newsitem.title: USA: Micro Warehouse sees $28 mln total charge.
newsitem.headline: Micro Warehouse sees $28 mln total charge.

text.p: Micro Warehouse Inc said on Tuesday it would restate its financial results for both fiscal 1994 and 1995, and possibly for fiscal 1993, and it expected a total operating charge to profits for all of these periods of about $28 million after-tax.

The company, which said the matters would not affect ongoing operations, said it would take $2.5 million of the after-tax charge in the first quarter 1996. It said it continued to oversee a previously announced review of errors uncovered in its accounting procedures during these periods.
These errors affected Micro Warehouse's reported gross margins, it said.
